thread.title: Tigers' Norris says he kept pitching with cancerous growth
thread.title_full: Tigers' Norris says he kept pitching with cancerous growth

title: Tigers' Norris says he kept pitching with cancerous growth
text: > Sports Tigers' Norris says he kept pitching with cancerous growth FILE- In this Sept. 29, 2015, file photo, Detroit Tigers pitcher Daniel Norris (44) throws to the Texas Rangers in the first inning of a baseball game in Arlington, Texas. Norris said he kept pitching last season after finding out he had a cancerous growth on his thyroid. In a message on Twitter and Instagram on Monday, Oct. 19, the 22-year-old Norris said he found out the growth was malignant but was told by a doctor that he could wait until the end of the season to have it removed. (AP Photo/Tony Gutierrez, File)
